body:
i  just tried some more app and got this


debug	 core	 include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	 2013-10-09t03:46:43+00:00
debug	 core	 user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	 2013-10-09t03:46:43+00:00
debug	 core	 user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	 2013-10-09t03:46:43+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
debug	core	include path for class "oc_user_imap" starts with "apps/"	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
debug	core	adding default user backend openid.	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
error	core	user backend oc_user_imap not found.	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
warning	php	opendir(c:\windows\temp/owncloud-524a9b784854d/): failed to open dir: no such file or directory at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\lib\cache\fileglobal.php#92	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
warning	php	opendir(c:\windows\temp/owncloud-524a9b784854d/,c:\windows\temp/owncloud-524a9b784854d/): access is denied. (code: 5) at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\lib\cache\fileglobal.php#92	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	include path for class "oc_user_imap" starts with "apps/"	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
debug	core	adding default user backend openid.	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
error	core	user backend oc_user_imap not found.	2013-10-09t03:46:53+00:00
warning	php	opendir(c:\windows\temp/owncloud-524a9b784854d/): failed to open dir: no such file or directory at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\lib\cache\fileglobal.php#92	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
warning	php	opendir(c:\windows\temp/owncloud-524a9b784854d/,c:\windows\temp/owncloud-524a9b784854d/): access is denied. (code: 5) at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\lib\cache\fileglobal.php#92	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00
debug	core	user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	2013-10-09t03:46:45+00:00

hi,

the access denied / failed to open dir message can be fixed when giving you webservers user the proper read and write permissions to the c:\windows\temp/ folder.

the other messages are probably releated to: https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/2772, https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/1826

i know im going to sound like a newb but i have never worked with a server before i know about folder properties and permissions but i didnt see anything in there that i thought could relate to oc can you guide me through the steps plz
